title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - October 5, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - October 5, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark link up on Mark's birthday to tease a story involving a city suing the NFL and a breaking story out of New York where the FBI is raiding police union office.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
